title: ‘An Awolowo will become President of Nigeria’
content:
The new matriarch of the Awolowo clan has predicted that someone from the family, would eventually lead Nigeria someday. The eldest daughter of the late Chief Obafemi Awolowo- Rev. Omotola Oyediran, said on Tuesday, that a descendant of the late Yoruba leader, would become President. She revealed that she used to pray about it but stopped at some point, 

This post appeared first on YNaija....
